Title: Burning Reflections
Description:
Sybaestan could use your support now. His little brother was his best friend. Only death could separate them... and it has. He is not taking it well.

It is customary to burn written memories of the deceased. By committing them to the flames, we let go our heartache and let the warmth of memory heal us. It is a bittersweet time. You were with Theleon at the end, too. That might help Sybaestan.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet Sister Blayze near the memorial flame.
CompletionText: The ritual helps ease the hearts of many.
RewardText: It worries me Sybaestan's still in such anger over his grief.
